instructions.title: Basic Swimming Controls
instructions.description: Use WASD or arrow keys to navigate your fish through the ocean. The faster you swim, the more energy you consume, so manage your stamina wisely.

instructions.title: Hunting Mechanics
instructions.description: Approach smaller fish to automatically consume them. Larger prey requires multiple bites. Watch out for fish that are too big - they might fight back!

instructions.title: Evolution Points
instructions.description: Gain evolution points by eating prey and surviving. Use these points to upgrade your fish's abilities: speed, size, defense, and special powers.

instructions.title: Depth Management
instructions.description: Deeper waters contain bigger prey but also more dangerous predators. Use the depth meter to find the perfect hunting zone for your current size.

instructions.title: Predator Avoidance
instructions.description: When you see a larger predator, swim away quickly! Use coral reefs and seaweed for cover. Some predators can be outmaneuvered with quick direction changes.

instructions.title: Special Abilities
instructions.description: Unlock special abilities as you evolve: electric shocks, camouflage, speed bursts, and more. Each ability has a cooldown period, so use them strategically.
